snippet.title: Desecrators - Trailer
snippet.description:
Desecrators is a fast-paced sci-fi co-op shooter. Pilot heavily armed gunships through alien derelicts while facing a wide roster of deadly robotic enemies.

Available in Early Access at Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1311570/Desecrators/
